casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Xavier Dominique JOHNSON. No. 72P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Xavier Dominique Johnson. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of February 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of March 2007."

Justice HUDSON recused.
